channel.title: How to i embedd the code into my site!
channel.description:
I want to put either my WEBCLIENT (from rs-ps or moparscape client) or my CLIENT and embed it into my website. I know RS3SERVER HAS done it to the moparscape one.
Can you tell me in detail how i am to do this..
NB: i have a website setup and running with a content management system etc.. just want to embed it into the "play now" page.
Thanks.
